dimension: 30 1/2 x 22 1/2 in. (77.47 x 57.15 cm) (without fringe or tassels)
title: Wedding headpiece
description: black panel with black knotted fringe on short sides and long brown and tan tassels at corners; squares, rectangles and bands of flower or star, swastika and other geometric motifs embroidered overall in white, pale green, brown and blue
